segments.text: I see two children involved in a bit of mischief on the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a precarious two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, there's a large jar clearly labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside, pulling out cookies, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, palm open, anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite a team, operating in secret while the adult is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's rather amusing how stealthy they're trying to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the forbidden cookies through their eagerness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely breaking a rule, but their coordination is impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught too soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
